overview.en: Pax Dollar (USDP) was created by Paxos, a financial technology company on a mission to modernize finance by mobilizing assets at the speed of the internet. Paxos was the first virtual currency company to receive a charter from the New York State Department of Financial Services. As a chartered limited purpose trust company with fiduciary powers under the Banking Law, Paxos is able to offer regulated services in the crypto-asset and virtual commodities space.
overview.zh: Pax Dollar (USDP) 由金融科技公司 Paxos 创建，其使命是通过以互联网的速度调动资产来实现金融现代化。 Paxos 是第一家获得纽约州金融服务部授权的虚拟货币公司。 作为根据银行法拥有信托权力的特许有限目的信托公司，Paxos 能够在加密资产和虚拟商品领域提供受监管的服务。
